detail_desc: Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a small, imitation leather appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length dress in a cotton weave with embroidery, super-thin adjustable shoulder straps and shaped cups. V -neck at the front, concealed zip in the side, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with appliqués on the front, a round neck and buttons down the front. Scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a ribbed hem with short slits in the sides.
Short, wide, short-sleeved sports top in printed, fast-drying mesh layered over a vest top with a racer back.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front.
Sports top in fast-drying mesh with long sleeves, thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.Slightly longer at the back. The top is made partly from recycled polyester.
Baby Exclusive. Polo-neck collar in soft, rib-knit wool.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand, cuffs and slits at the hem. Button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Puff pants in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist. Narrow elastication and an overlocked frill trim around the hems.
Short, high-waisted skirt in leather with decorative seams, a concealed zip in one side and a raw-edge hem. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Fancy dress costume in jersey with a zip down the front and a hood with an eye mask at the front.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in pleated jersey with butterfly sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative tie detail at the front, and straight, wide legs.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sock boots in imitation suede with a soft elasticated shaft and covered heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Sports trousers in fast-drying fabric with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams, tapered legs and reflective details.
Short, straight-cut dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a gentle V-neck and narrow shoulder straps with decorative tie details at the top.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sewn-in turn-up.
Joggers in a rustle weave with an elasticated waist, contrasting colour stripes down the sides with appliqués on one side and an elastic drawstring at the hems.
Fine-knit polo-neck jumper in soft merino wool with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 10.5 cm.
Fully lined swimsuit with a draped front, underwired padded cups, adjustable shoulder straps and a silicone trim at the top of the back.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with short kimono sleeves, slits in the sides and no buttons.

Set with a hat and pair of mittens in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend. Hat with faux fur pompom on top and ear flaps with ties. Mittens (sizes 0-6 months without thumbs) with fold-down ribbing at the cuffs. Fleece lining.
Bikini briefs in jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Set with a T-shirt, hooded jacket and pair of joggers in soft cotton. Jersey T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a print motif on the front. Jacket in patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets with ribbed trims and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, hook-and-eye fastener and concealed button. Side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides, fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 6 cm.
Pull-on jeans in stretch, supersoft denim in a loose fit with an elasticated drawstring waist. Fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket, and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 1½-3Y with normal sequins), seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Two-button jacket in a textured cotton weave with a decorative buttonhole on one lapel, chest pocket, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Slightly boxy cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool. Long sleeves, short slits in the sides and no fasteners.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and a longer layer in woven fabric at the hem, designed to look like the bottom of a shirt.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and open chest pocket.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1.2 cm to 5 cm.
Short, fitted dress in washed, stretch denim with a V-neck front and back and a zip down the front.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in twill. Loose fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, frill-trimmed sleeves, a tapered waist and a gently flared skirt.
Short, sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with pleats at the top and a small opening at the back. Lined.
Short jersey top with a V-neck, short sleeves, decorative buttons and a tie detail at the front and an elasticated hem.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Biker shorts in ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. High, elasticated waist.
Shorts in cotton twill with a drawstring at the waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Nightdress in patterned cotton jersey with a frill trim at the shoulders, long sleeves and a gathered seam at the top.
A pair of metal hoop earrings with pearly plastic beads.
Cable-knit jumper in a mohair and wool blend with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a dress, pair of puff pants and a hairband in soft, crinkled cotton jersey. Dress with embroidery at the top and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with a flounced trim over the shoulders, a seam at the top and a flared skirt. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and narrow elastication and a small frill trim around the legs. Hairband with a bow at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Lined at the front. Medium support.

Rain mittens in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with sealed seams. Elastication at the top and an elastic strap with a press-stud around the wrists. Fleece lining. Size 2-6M with no thumbs. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in sturdy, washed denim with hard-worn details, an extra-high waist, button fly and straight legs.
Jersey cap in a cotton blend with an inner terry sweatband and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying, functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a longer inner top with a racer back.
Hipster briefs in soft microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and full coverage at the back.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Linen jersey top in a relaxed fit with a V-neck, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Short jersey dress with short sleeves and visible seams. Drawstring at the front to create a draped effect. Unlined.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in an airy cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves and a small chest pocket. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Set in metal with three non-matching earrings, three ear cuffs and one stud earring. Two of the earrings, one of the ear cuffs and the stud earring are decorated with glass rhinestones.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.

Cropped blouse in an airy weave with a smocked bodice and frill-trimmed, square neckline. Long, wide sleeves with concealed elastication over the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs with a small frill trim.
Elastic scrunchies in various designs.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Trousers in a Tencel™ lyocell and linen weave with a high waist and concealed zip with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener in one side. Closer fit at the top and wide, extra-long, straight legs with creases and high slits at the hems.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Short T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a text print on the chest. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and pockets in the side seams.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lightly padded cups with removable inserts, double adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Seamless. Light support.
